stripped_text: Place 9 credits on this event, then run any server. During that run, hosted credits are considered to be in your credit pool. When that run ends, suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented.
text: Place 9[credit] on this event, then run any server. During that run, hosted credits are considered to be in your credit pool. When that run ends, suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented.
title: Stimhack
